You are a communicative person with a positive attitude, you take ownership of your work and always give it your best.
   

  

**What you need to succeed:**
* Minimum a bachelor’s degree in architecture or interior design.
* Project management skills, ability to oversee and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* High proficiency in Revit.
* Great communication and presentation skills.
* Bonus: Some previous working experience within the area of commercial/retail architecture or interior design, with a focus on layout design and planning.


****Additional Information****
 These are
 **temporary positions** 
 (11 months) based at our Head Office in Stockholm, starting as soon as possible.
 **Traveling will be included in the positions** 
 .
   

  

 Apply by sending in your
 **CV in English** 
 as soon as possible. Due to data policies, we only accept applications through career page.
   

  

****Benefits****
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

*In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.*
**Inclusion & Diversity
   

  

 H&M** 
 is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organization. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.
   

  

****Company Description****
 H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way. Learn more about H&M here.

title: Engineer III, Field Service
description:
***This inclusive employer is a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community.***
 Work Schedule
   

  

**Other**
 Environmental Conditions
   

  

 Office
   

  

**Job Description**
 Are you an engineer that seeks challenges within a positive and encouraging community? Or used optical instrumentation in your career and embraces its science? Then we have a role for you within our diverse service environment!
   

  

 How you will make an impact
   

  

 Discover impactful work as our new Field Service Engineer (FSE) based in the Nordics. As an FSE, you will be responsible for delivering service activities including Installations, Repairs and Maintenance Services for the Bulk Elemental Analysis team in EMEA. This highly exciting and professional role will deliver a high level of customer service resulting in customer happiness.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 You will primarily support our Nordic based customers utilising our Optical Emission Spectroscopy, X-Ray Fluorescence and robotic automation product portfolio. You will:
   

  

* Own and deliver on service activities such as installations, repairs, preventative maintenance, problem solving on scientific instruments
* Specific product support to be given on OES, XRF, XRD and automation instruments.
* Work remotely providing on-site services exceeding customer expectations and ensuring that customers become promoters of our business through positive feedback and dedication.
* Deliver the highest professional relationship with our customer base raising technical issues to quickly resolve accurately critical tasks.
* Enable the customer's success through their partnership with Thermo Fisher Scientific.
* Optimise own work schedule by coordinating with all the required partners for service planning (Dispatch function, Team Leader, Senior Manager)
* Manage company assets including parts inventory, laptop computer, mobile phone, test equipment, tools, software, company car etc.
* Responsible for timely and accurate reporting of activities including field service reports and expenses reports
* Collaborate with the Sales team regarding lead generation, customer activities and updates.


 Candidates can be based anywhere within Norway, Sweden or Denmark, providing you live close to an international airport.
   

  

 Our Organisation
   

  

 Our customized service offerings and outstanding services have the flexibility and experience to uniquely address our customer's business needs. Whether they are looking to arrange for service on a single instrument or are seeking resources to handle entire labs, there is a solution to meet their business requirements.
   

  

**Who We Are Looking For**
* Professional background in Electronics/Engineering or related subjects
* Experience in handling or servicing analytical equipment gained either as an Engineer, application specialist or working as a Scientist or Technician in a laboratory
* Some knowledge of spectroscopy would be an advantage, but not critical
* Proficient in English; additional Nordic languages a plus
* A valid Driver's License
* Comfortable working in a customer-facing role, with an always customer-centric approach
* Strong interpersonal and administrative skills
* Self-sufficient; comfortable working independently and a logical approach to setting work priorities
* Willing and able to travel extensively on a weekly basis across the region (4 to 5 days per week), including some overnight stays and longer trips for trainings etc - up to 70% annum.


**What's In It For You**
* Excellent career progression opportunities with a large and growing global employer.
* High quality training and mentoring
* Competitive salary, plus performance bonus & full benefits package
* Company car


**About Us**
 Thermo Fisher Scientific is an equal opportunities employer. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Watch as our colleagues explain 5 reasons to work with us. As one team of 100,000+ colleagues, we share a common set of values

title: Junior Content Producer till Gårdssällskapet
description:
Gårdssällskapet startades 2013 för att hjälpa matälskare att få ekologiskt kött från gården hem till dörren. Våra bönder arbetar med hållbart jordbruk på svenska ekogårdar där den biologiska mångfalden och djurens välmående blomstrar. Gårdssällskapets verksamhet genomsyras av personlig service och kvalitet. Våra kunder älskar riktigt bra mat! Som en del av teamet Marknad & Kommunikation kommer du arbeta brett med kommunikation, med tyngdpunkt på e-post som är en viktig försäljningskanal för oss. Premiumkött, matinspiration och hälsningar från våra ekogårdar utgör en stor del av vår kommunikation. Du blir del av ett familjärt företag med starka värderingar och ges möjligheten att bidra i vårt viktiga kommunikationsarbete! Låter det som något för dig? Läs vidare!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Gårdssällskapet AB
 



  

**Plats :**
 Solna
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Marketing / Information / Media
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Gårdssällskapet är en gårdsbutik online som säljer ekologiska köttlådor. Vi köper kött från den ekologiska gården, styckar i egen regi innan vi levererar ut till konsument. Vi säljer även svenska delikatesser från små mathantverkare som ost, marmelad och chark. Produkterna vi säljer är ekologiskt, småskaligt eller vilt producerade. Hela bolaget har runt 32 anställda, och på huvudkontoret i Lilla Frösunda Herrgård arbetar idag runt 20 personer inom bla inköp, sälj, utveckling och kundservice. och du kommer dagligen ha kontakt med flertalet av funktionerna.
 


  


 Teamet Marknad & Kommunikation kommer bestå av denna roll och din närmsta chef och ni ansvarar för Gårdssällskapets kommunikation i alla kanaler. Du kommer arbeta med att skapa text och bild för bl.a. e-post, vår e-handel, hemsida, sociala kanaler och print. Du ansvarar för att ta fram texter som konverterar och inspirerar våra befintliga och potentiella kunder. Här är det en fördel om du är strukturerad, gillar att arbeta i team och har en förmåga att justera lagda planer med kort varsel. Färskt kött är en fantastisk men ibland svårarbetad produkt och därav kan kommunikationen behöva förändras snabbt.
 


  


  

**Några ord från din framtida chef**



  


 “Hej! Jag heter Anna och är marknads- och kommunikationschef på Gårdssällskapet. Om jag på bara några rader ska lyfta fram det bästa med att arbeta med kommunikation på Gårdssällskapet skulle jag säga att det är själva innehållet. Att få prata om mat varje dag, leta fram den härligaste bilden från någon av våra gårdar där grisarna precis som Griseknoen badar lerbad och betar i gröna hagar. Skriva texter om marmorering, maillardeffekt och biologisk mångfald. Att veta att korna har det precis så bra som det ser ut på fotot - för det var vi som fotade det förra veckan. Det här är en toppentjänst för dig som gillar att jobba brett med kommunikation i många olika kanaler, både digitalt och print. Vi gör väldigt mycket själva. Fotar, filmar, redigerar, skriver, lagar mat. Pratar med bönder och klurar på bra kampanjer. Du kommer få egna ansvarsområden, och stora möjligheter att vara med och utveckla Gårdssällskapets erbjudande och kommunikation. Det blir många samarbeten med andra team för att tillsammans ge våra kunder en så bra produkt och upplevelse som möjligt. Du kommer jobba i en öppen och familjär atmosfär med högt i tak. Vi vågar testa, och blir det inte bra så testar vi igen. Vill du dessutom jobba med en produkt och ett varumärke du kan stå för - ekologiskt och småskaligt? Då kommer du att stortrivas hos oss!”
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Arbete i ett bolag som satsar på att växa, detta ger dig möjlighet att inte bara jobba med förvaltning utan också bidra med nya idéer
  
* En möjlighet att påverka dina roll och bidra med dina kunskaper
  
* Arbete i ett dynamiskt och personligt bolag
  
* Tjänstepension, 5000 kr i friskvårdsbidrag, förmånligt pris på Gårdssällskapets produkter, dator & telefon m.m.
  


  


  

**Arbetsuppgifter**



  


 Du kommer att arbeta i en bred roll med stort fokus på att skriva säljande text för e-post som är en viktig försäljningskanal för Gårdssällskapet. Du kommer även ta fram relevant innehåll till hemsidan och skapa printat material. Du förmedlar information om ekologiskt kött, ekogårdar och tipsar om recept för att ge kunder och potentiella kunder inspirerande läsning. Vi ser det som viktigt att du både gillar och är duktig på detta och gärna bidrar i arbetet. Gårdssällskapet är en säljdriven organisation som kontinuerligt utvecklar och förbättrar produkter och kommunikation och här är du med och bidrar till detta.
 


  


 Du kommer även göra mindre redigeringar av foto och film, skapa enklare grafiskt innehåll och ha kontakt med bondgårdar för att producera nytt material. Observera dock att fokus ligger på just text och att skapa bra innehåll för e-post. Du kommer att arbeta nära kollegor inom såväl marknad som sälj, kundservice och IT och även ansvara för kontakt med externa parter vid beställning och koordinering av trycksaker.
   




**Vi söker dig som**

 I denna rekrytering kommer vi lägga stor vikt vid dig som person och ditt intresse för såväl tjänsten som Gårdsällskapet som företag. Vi söker dig som är kreativ, driven och bra på att skriva. Du älskar mat, brinner för att sätta rätt ord och bild till ditt budskap och tycker att svenska ekogårdar är av stor vikt för Sveriges biologiska mångfald och självförsörjningsgrad. Du trivs med att samarbeta med andra och har förmågan att anpassa dig efter nya förutsättningar. Du kan förvalta det som är bra, och ser var det finns utvecklingspotential.
 


  


 Utöver det har du…
 


  

  
* Ett par års erfarenhet av en liknande roll, vi ser det som särskilt viktigt att du jobbat med e-postmarknadsföring
  
* Kunskaper inom SEO
  
* Kunskaper inom redigering av film och foto
  
* Erfarenhet av CMS-verktyg, Gårdssällskapet jobbar i Magento
  
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska då det är arbetsspråket
  


  


 Vi ser det som meriterande om du har…
 


  

  
* Erfarenhet från en liknande bransch
  
* Kunskaper inom Indesign / Lightroom / Photoshop el. motsvarande.
  
* Nyfikenhet på AI och prompting
  


  


  

**Övrigt information**



  

  
* Start: enligt överenskommelse
  
* Omfattning: heltid
  
* Placering: Solna, möjlighet till remotearbete ett par dagar i veckan
  
* Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work och alla frågor kring processen hanteras av Academic Work.
  
* Kontaktuppgifter: Ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Johanna Sörell, johanna.sorell@academicwork.se samt rekryteringskoordinator Minna Loosaar, minna.loosaar@academicwork.se
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Gårdssällskapet AB**

 Läs mer om Gårdssällskapet på deras hemsida: https://www.gardssallskapet.se/
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Gårdssällskapet AB**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Johanna Sörell eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stn05@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15105453

title: Senior Engineer/Tech Lead in Unit Master Data Production – Solna/Hybrid
description:
The IT department at PostNord consists of a dedicated team responsible for driving innovation and delivering high-quality software solutions. Our mission is to support the organization's strategic goals by developing scalable and efficient systems. We foster a collaborative and inclusive culture where every team member's contribution is valued.
   

  

**Job Duties**
 As the Senior Engineer/Tech Lead for the Geographical Information Master, you will be coding and play a pivotal role in leading the Tech development and enhancement of PostNord Geographical Master Data. With the most part of PostNord systems consuming GIM Master data and Nordic Countries using the GIM UI your responsibilities will include making sure that the application is using the right software and that it is updated accordingly. You will collaborate closely with PO, Team, Senior Master Data Architect and Enterprise Master Data Architect making sure GIM system is developed and maintained correctly.
   

  

**We are looking for you who have** 
**Experience: (Need-to-have)**
* Experience in managing application with Event driven architecture.
* Proven experience (3+ years) as an Engineer or similar role like Tech Lead.
* Experience in building microservices
* Understanding of container orchestration platforms and experience deploying production software
* Solid understanding of software architecture, design patterns, and best practices
* Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think critically
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Knowledge and experience working with GO
* Experience with Agile methodologies and DevOps practices


**Meritorious experience: (Nice-to-have)**
* Experience in working with logistics industry specifically around Master Data and Geographical Data.
* Strong understanding of PostNord Geographical Data, particularly within the Nordic region.


**We believe you are a person that is:**
* Thorough, analytical, and quick to learn new systems
* Inclusive, structured, and responsible in your working style
* Able to handle stressful situations and prioritize tasks independently
* Communicative and easy to collaborate with, building and nurturing long-term relationships


**We offer you**
**Benefits**
 We offer a variety of work in an international environment with constantly new challenges and quick decisions. Here you have opportunities to develop creative solutions and work in a prestige-free group where we jointly help to reach our goals. PostNord is one of Sweden's largest workplaces and we offer safe employment conditions and benefits. In addition to the benefits mentioned above, we offer:
   

  

* Hybrid workplace with a Nordic and dynamic environment.  Watch the video about our office.
* Great development opportunities
* Great insurance and occupational pension terms
* Wellness allowance & opportunity to train at Arken's gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through  PostNord Plus - PostNord´s own personnel foundation


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are in a constant transformation and work consistently to develop both our offer and our employees, all to achieve our vision of being The favorite carrier of the Nordics. We are PostNord - a fantastic company to work and grow with. Read more at postnord.com
   

  

**Apply**
 We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

 If you have any questions or concerns, please contact manager Robin Lindfors on robin.lindfors1@postnord.com
   

  

 Don't wait to submit your application as we go through the applications on an ongoing basis.
   

  

 For union representatives, visit:  Facklig kontakt | PostNord
   

  

 We are looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Fullstack Java Career Program, Fall 2024, Stockholm
description:
Are you the next passionated hobby coder dreaming of becoming a Fullstack Java Developer in only 3 months? In that case - you fit the profile! ☕️🧂
   

  

**The Career Program**
 The SALT career program consists of 3 months intense full time coding (free of charge) and after successfully completing the training, our commercial team will connect you with an external tech team for 12 months as a SALT consultant.
 *Note that the first salary is paid out the month after the employment starts, it is therefore important that you can financially manage during the unpaid months during training.*
 Training start date:
 **September 6th 2024**
**Tell me more!**
 Our career programs are entirely free of charge for motivated individuals who are ready to transform their
 *passion to profession* 
 and launch their career in tech. We believe in accelerated learning guided by our experienced and specialized instructors. This allows our developers to be fully equipped with all the tools to operate in any high-performing development team. Since our launch in 2018, we have conducted trainings in .Net, Java and Javascript and graduated over 600 developers to be placed as consultants at various clients like SJ, Klarna and Trustly. After the consultancy year, 90% of our consultants are then being full-time employed at the company.
   

  

**Do you fit the profile?**
 We are looking for flexible and solution-oriented team players who want to accelerate quickly in their coding career by applying both your technical and soft skills in the consultancy role. What is unique about SALT is that the program allows hobby coders to fast-track a career within development, it is therefore
 *not* 
 required to have previously worked within tech.
   

  

**The requirements to be eligible are:**
* That you have been coding consistently for the last 5 months ≈ 15 hours per week
* You have prior work experience collaborating with others in a team
* Fluency in written and spoken English (the teaching language is in English)
* Hold a valid work permit for at least two years from the training start date
* That you are permanently located in or nearby Stockholm (the training is held on-site and can not be conducted remotely)


 Questions? Check out the FAQ on our website!
   

  

**APPLY NOW ✏️**
 The application is now
 **open** 
 and we are reviewing applications on an ongoing basis - so don’t procrastinate your dream of becoming a Full Stack Developer! Let's take that coding from
 *passion to profession 🚀*
*SALT is proud to be an equal employer that welcomes individuals of all genders, backgrounds and experiences. Join our team and be part of a company at the forefront of technology, that values and promotes wide diversity in the workplace. There is a profound sense of culture at SALT which is inclusive, open and dynamic.*

title: Talent Search
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
 När du kliver på Sopra Steria-tåget blir du en del av en spännande resa! Vi är ett växande bolag med stora ambitioner, vår kultur är inkluderande och varm, vilket bevisats genom att vi har utsetts till en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser 2024 av Great Place to Work.
   

  

**Om Rollen**
 Vårt TA-team (Talent Acquisition) växer och vi söker en ny medlem till vårt härliga team. Vi söker dig som är i början av din karriär och vill lära dig mer om TA-arbetet. Du kommer att arbeta med talent search och tillsammans med teamet sträva efter att hitta de bästa kandidaterna.Hos oss på Sopra Steria sitter kunskapsdelning i väggarna och är en av ingredienserna till att vi har kul på jobbet - vi kallar det Power of Sharing.
   

  

 Ditt fokus kommer främst vara att arbeta med search och kontakt med potentiella talanger och nya medarbetare inom IT-området. Du förväntas arbeta självständigt och ta stort eget ansvar för att processerna ska gå framåt. Vi ser att du har goda möjligheter att växa vidare inom teamet och bolaget.
   

  

 Dina Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

* Searcha i olika databaser och externa kanaler, som t.ex. LinkedIn, samt aktivt bevaka marknaden och leta upp lämpliga kandidater via olika nätverk och artiklar.
* Kontakta kandidater via telefon, hålla telefonintervjuer och presentera konsultrollen och Sopra Steria som arbetsgivare. Du kommer även att bygga "talent pools" med relevant expertis.
* Ha regelbundna avstämningar och statusrapporteringar till interna stakeholders.
* Stötta rekryteringsteamet i övriga uppgifter, såsom att genomföra events, delta i arbetsmarknadsdagar, administrera rekryteringsprocesser och referenstagning.


**Vem är du?**
 För att lyckas i rollen som Talent Search krävs att du är målmedveten och engagerar dig i varje specifik roll för att hitta de bästa kandidaterna. Du bör vara analytisk, orädd, förtroendeingivande och ansvarsfull.Du trivs i en miljö med högt tempo och har förmåga att snabbt anpassa dig efter olika situationer. Du tycker om att ta kontakt med andra och trivs med att prata i telefon. Vi ser gärna att du har en relevant universitets-/högskoleutbildning. Erfarenhet av search/sourcing eller försäljning, gärna inom IT, är meriterande.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Ansök enkelt genom att ladda upp ditt CV! Observera att vi inte tar emot ansökningar inkomna via mail. Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller om oss som bolag är du välkommen att kontakta Hanna Korell (hanna.korell@soprasteria.com).
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Fullstack developer to big bank in Stockholm!
description:
Are you excited about tackling complex technical challenges in a major bank? Join an innovative IT team in Stockholm to enhance the banks fraud monitoring systems. We’re seeking talented fullstack developers eager to make a significant impact in a dynamic and supportive environment. Apply today - the position start as soon as possible!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time, long term assignment
 



  

**Start date :**
 As soon as possible
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
   




**About the role**

 The role involves working with a complex technical setup, understanding and documenting the entire solution, and ensuring the smooth integration of various components. You will work closely with other team members to handle incidents, install applications and maintain the infrastructure.
 


  


 In the role you will work with complex technical setups, dive into configurations, and understand how everything fits together. You will document the entire solution, including its setup, configuration, and how components interact and depend on each other to handle incidents and install applications. Due to this, the role requires someone who are interested in a mix of software development and infrastructure, who want to focus on configuration management and scripting.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* The opportunity to become part of a large international company at the forefront of technology.
  
* An incredible opportunity to take your next step in your IT career, learn and grow alongside skilled colleagues in an exciting technical environment.
  
* The chance to develop internally and increase your expertise in banking and finance.
  
* A dedicated consultant manager from Academic Work who will support and coach you in your future career. This is a long-term assignment through Academic Work with the possibility of direct recruitment by the bank if all parties are satisfied with the cooperation in the future.
  

  


**Work tasks**
  
* Manage and enhance the banks internal fraud monitoring systems and communication oversight.
  
* Collaborate with IT team to handle and implement software solutions, ensuring better control and management.
  
* Document technical configurations and solutions, understanding the setup and integration of complex systems.
  
* Perform coding tasks, configuration management, and scripting to support and maintain advanced infrastructure components.
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* Academic background in
   

**Computer Science or Information Technology**
 , or other relevant education within IT
  
* Documented software development and infrastructure knowledge, from previous roles, projects/hobby or internship
  
* Good knowledge with Linux, Oracle, SQL, and Kubernetes
  
* Good knowledge of an object oriented programming language
  
* Ability to document technical solutions and understand system configurations
  
* Knowledge of scripting and configuration management
  
* Fluent in english
  
* Swedish citizenship or a valid work permit enabling immediate start in the position.
  


  


  

**It is meritorious if you have**



  

  
* Either a testing background, a infrastructure background or a developer background
  
* Experience from a tech stack covering: Elasticsearch, YML, MQ, Prometheus/Grafana, LogI, encryption technologies and AWS.
   

 Knowledge can be gained through education, experience or self-taught.
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**



  

  
* Self-Sufficient
  
* ProblemSolver
  
* ResultsOriented
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Milla Olsson or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on stw01@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15105120

title: Handläggare inom Erasmus+
description:
Vill du arbeta i en verksamhet som skapar möjlighet för utbildning, utveckling och utbyten både nationellt och internationellt?
   

  

 Vi söker nu en handläggare inom Erasmus+ till Enheten för yrkesutbildning och vuxnas lärande vid Avdelningen för internationellt samarbete.
   

  

 Universitets- och högskolerådet, UHR, är en statlig myndighet med ett brett uppdrag inom utbildningsområdet. Vår vision är utbildning, utbyte och utveckling - för alla som vill vidare.
   

  

 UHR arbetar för att höja kvaliteten inom svensk utbildning genom att ge människor förutsättningar att delta i internationellt utbyte och samarbete. Via de internationella programmen som UHR ansvarar för kan skolor, universitet och högskolor, yrkesutbildningar och vuxenutbildningar med flera söka bidrag för att genomföra samarbetsprojekt med andra länder. Lärare, studenter och elever är exempel på grupper som kan delta i utbytena.
   

  

 Vad du kommer att göra/ansvara för
   

  

 Som handläggare inom Erasmus+, det europeiska programmet för utbildningssamarbete, är de huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifterna:
   

  

* Handlägga projektansökningar, ta fram beslutsunderlag, utfärda kontrakt och hantera utbetalningar. Vi använder EU-kommissionens IT-system för hantering av ansökningar och rapporter.
* Arbeta i processer med kollegor samt bidra till att utveckla processer och rutiner för hantering av ärenden.
* Ge råd och stöd till pågående projekt.
* Informera och sprida kännedom om programmet för att öka intresset att söka och delta i programmet.
* Kontrollera projekt bland annat genom att granska slutrapporter.
* Analysera och sprida resultat inom programmet och bidra med underlag till rapporter, analyser och årliga uppföljningar.


 Även andra uppgifter kan förekomma.
   

  

 Du som söker
   

  

 Du har:
   

  

* Relevant akademisk examen eller motsvarande erfarenhet som arbetsgivaren bedömer som likvärdig.
* Erfarenhet av handläggning inom offentlig förvaltning.
* Goda kunskaper om svenskt utbildningsväsende och erfarenhet av arbete inom utbildningssektorn.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


 Det är meriterande om du har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av att administrera eller driva EU-finansierade projekt, gärna inom Erasmus+.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med internationellt samarbete inom utbildningssektorn.
* Goda kunskaper i Excel samt erfarenhet av arbete i databaser.
* Erfarenhet av arbete med budget och ekonomisk redovisning.
* Egen erfarenhet av studier eller arbete utomlands.
* Särskilt meriterande med erfarenhet från gymnasieskola, yrkesutbildning eller vuxnas lärande eller av att ha arbetat med LiA/APL.


 Som handläggare hos oss bör du trivas i rollen som statstjänsteperson och kunna kombinera god service med likabehandling och rättssäkerhet. Arbete med EU-finansierad verksamhet kräver ett arbetssätt som präglas av mycket god ordning och reda, noggrannhet och struktur. Det är viktigt att du snabbt kan sätta dig in i regelverk, i regel på engelska. Det är också viktigt att kunna genomföra uppgifter inom givna ramar och i tid. Arbetet förutsätter hög grad av eget ansvarstagande men då du arbetar i ett team måste du också ha god förmåga att samarbeta med andra människor. Du är en god kommunikatör, både i tal och skrift och kan företräda myndigheten i olika sammanhang. Du bör också vara bekväm med att tala inför större grupper.
   

  

 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet.
   

  

 Vad vi gör och erbjuder
   

  

 UHR har flera uppdrag inom utbildningsområdet vars gemensamma nämnare är att skapa möjligheter till utveckling genom utbildning och internationella utbyten. Vi är cirka 340 anställda i Stockholm och Visby. UHR:s mål är att vara en attraktiv arbetsgivare där medarbetare och chefer jobbar tillsammans för långsiktig utveckling. Vi erbjuder en professionell och stimulerande miljö med goda möjligheter till personlig utveckling. Vi värnar om en rekrytering fri från diskriminering och ser inte ytterligare anpassningar som ett hinder.
   

  

 Anställningen omfattar heltid och gäller tillsvidare med tillträde efter överenskommelse. UHR tillämpar sex månaders provanställning. Placeringsort är Solna.
   

  

 Våra villkor och förmåner
   

  

 Mer om UHR
   

  

 Ansök och bli en av oss!
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan i form av personligt brev och CV märkt med diarienummer 2.2.1-01039-2024 När du gör din ansökan vill vi att du besvarar ett antal urvalsfrågor. Vi kommer i det första urvalet att utgå från svaren på dessa frågor. På så vis utvärderar UHR kandidaterna på lika villkor. CV och personligt brev kommer att läsas i nästa steg i urvalsprocessen.
 **Sista ansökningsdatum är 12 augusti 2024.**
 Har du några frågor om rekryteringen är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Ellen Gosdoum tfn. 010-470 03 80.
   

  

 Representant för SACO är Kerstin Martínez tfn 010- 470 04 69 och för ST Marianne Källberg tfn 010-470 04 51.
   

  

 Universitets- och högskolerådet har gjort medieval för denna rekrytering. Vi undanber oss därför kontakt med annonssäljare eller andra säljare av rekryteringstjänster.

title: Resande Servicetekniker till Benning
location: Upplands Väsby och Sollentuna, Stockholm County, Sweden
description:
Nu söker vi dig som är du ute efter en roll där du får arbeta med kunder över hela Sverige. Vill du kombinera ditt tekniska intresse med en social roll med mycket frihet under ansvar? Då kan detta vara en roll för dig. Sök tjänsten som resande Servicetekniker till Benning redan idag- urval sker löpande!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Benning Sweden AB
 



  

**Plats :**
 Sollentuna
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Teknik
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 I början på september
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 BENNING erbjuder avancerade avbrottsfria kraftsystem som säkrar driften av kritiska processer till användare inom Industri-, Energi-samt Telecom. Företaget ingår i BENNING koncernen med huvudkontor i Tyskland och deras svenska verksamhet ansvarar för den nordiska marknaden.
 


  


 I rollen som resande servicetekniker kommer du att jobba med Bennings eftermarknadsverksamhet. Du ansvarar för att hjälpa kunder med driftsättningar, akut- och avtalsservice samt underhåll av Benning system. Internt kommer du ha kontakt med produktion-, konstruktion- och säljavdelningen och externt har du kontakt med Bennings kunder runt om i Sverige. Du kommer att ingå i ett team med två andra servicetekniker och din närmsta chef kommer att vara bolagets Servicechef.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En roll med stor frihet under ansvar
  
* Ett givande och socialt arbete
  
* Möjlighet att plocka ut en förmånsbil
  
* En trivsam och familjär arbetsplats med en öppen och lättsam stämning bland alla medarbetare
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Utföra avtalsservice på Bennings kunder enligt planläggning
  
* Genomför driftsättning och operatörsutbildning
  
* Säkerställa kundnöjdhet och rekommendera produkter efter kundens behov
  
* Skriva protokoll på utfört arbete
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har en gymnasial eller eftergymnasial utbildning inom el
  
* Har en god datorvana och ett intresse för IT
  
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på svenska och engelska, då båda språken förekommer i det dagliga arbetet
  
* Har B-körkort
  


  


 Det är meriterande och din ansökan kommer att prioriteras om du har:
 


  

  
* Erfarenhet av fältservice av UPS-/strömförsörjningsutrustning.
  
* El behörighet B
  


  


  

**Tjänsten innefattar resor inom Sverige vilket kräver en personlig situation som tillåter resor. Övernattningar förekommer också.**



  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Hjälpsam
  
* Ordningsam
  
* Ansvarstagande
  
* Socialt självsäker
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
 


  


 Vår kund kommer att vara på sommarsemester vilket gör att intervjuer hos Benning kommer att ske under v.33-34.
   




**Benning Sweden AB**

 Läs mer om Benning Sweden AB här !
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Benning Sweden AB**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Sofia Axelsson eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på recruitmentstockholmsouth@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15105317

title: Join the Hoist Finance Team - Deskside Support Technician wanted!
description:
Are you passionate about technology and thrive in a dynamic, collaborative environment? Hoist Finance is seeking a talented Deskside Support Technician to join their innovative team at the forefront of the financial industry. This is your opportunity to make a significant impact, supporting Hoist Finance mission to reshape the landscape of debt management. Does this sound interesting? Take the chance and apply today!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**Company :**
 Hoist Finance AB
 



  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 According to agreement
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Recruitment
   




**About the role**

 Hoist Finance invests in non-performing loans from European banks and financial institutions. After acquiring a portfolio of loans, Hoist Finance set up sustainable repayment plans with people and companies, preferably in amicable agreements. Solid experience, knowledge of the regulatory environment, and local presence in many European markets enable Hoist Finance to offer extensive support with debt restructuring solutions. Hoist Finance prides themselves on providing exceptional IT services and support to ensure the seamless operation of their business applications and networks. We are currently seeking a highly motivated and skilled IT Deskside Support Technician to join their team.
 


  


 The Deskside Support Technician manages and supports IT assets and users from the Stockholm office and remotely across the Hoist Group. You will provide technical support, troubleshooting issues, and ensuring that the company's technology systems run smoothly. You will collaborate with a talented team of IT professionals across their Pan-European department. Hoist Finance Deskside Support Technician vacancy is based in their Stockholm office and reports to the IT Service Delivery Manager in Manchester.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* Modern facilities in central Stockholm
  
* Supportive and social colleagues - both at the office and international
  
* Personal development plans with great mentorship and management support
  
* Employer benefits such as an extended vacation, a great pension plan, and health contribution
  

  


**Work tasks**
  
* Provide first-level technical support to end-users via phone, email, or in-person, ensuring timely resolution of IT-related issues and inquiries
  
* Diagnose and troubleshoot hardware and software problems, including desktops, laptops, printers, and mobile devices
  
* Onboard and offboard employees
  
* Install, configure, and maintain computer systems, applications, and software updates
  
* Collaborate with colleagues and vendors to resolve complex technical issues and escalate problems as needed
  
* Document all support activities, solutions, and procedures in a clear and concise manner
  
* Assist in the implementation of IT policies and procedures to ensure data security and compliance
  
* Proactively monitoring all technical devices in the office to ensure any issues are reported, and when required provide hands-on support to troubleshoot and resolve issues; meeting room screens, booking screens, printers, network devices etc.
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* English proficiency (speaking, reading and writing)
  
* At least one year's experience in an IT role with demonstratable experience in end-user support
  
* Up-to-date knowledge of computer programs and hardware
  
* Experience using a ITSM tool such as ServiceNow (desirable)
  


  


  

**It is meritorious if you are**



  

  
* Fluent in Swedish, in both writing and speaking since the language is used in daily work
  


  


  

**Your personal skills are:**



  


 To succeed in the role, we believe that you are analytical and have good problem-solving skills. On top of that, we believe that you are service minded, a great collaborator, and have advanced interpersonal skills. You also have excellent organizational and time management skills.
 


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Get directly recruited to Hoist Finance AB**

 When you apply to this application, you will get hired by our partner. This means that you can relax while we take care of the application process.
   




**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Sofia Wahren or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on ste03@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15105429

title: Digital Workplace Specialist
description:
*Research shows that women and other under-represented groups within our industry hesitate to apply unless they tick most boxes of a role description. At H2 Green Steel, we are building an impact company with sustainability at its core. We need a diverse, inclusive, and authentic team to rally behind our purpose of de-carbonizing hard-to-abate industries, starting with steel.*
*So, i* 
*f you are equally passionate about our purpose yet concerned that your experience doesn* 
*’* 
*t* 
*perfectly* 
*align with the qualifications stated in the job advert, we strongly encourage you to apply anyway. You may be just the right candidate, either for this role – or for another upcoming role in our* 
*rapidly* 
*growing* 
*business* 
*.*
**About us:**
 H2 Green Steel is on a mission to disrupt the global steel industry by producing green steel, with the end goal of bringing down CO2 emissions to zero. By using green hydrogen and fossil-free electricity instead of coal; water and heat will be our primary emissions. By 2030, our ambition is to produce 5 million tonnes of green steel annually in our fully integrated, digitalized, and sustainable plant in Boden, located in northern Sweden - currently in construction phase. But this is just the beginning – our expertise in green hydrogen will enable us to decarbonize other industries in addition to steel, and we look forward to what’s next in store for us.
   

  

 We are looking for talented, innovative, and purpose-driven people to join our rapidly growing and diverse team. Our employees get to learn everyday, implement the latest technology and test and put their ideas into practice. Together, we are building an impact company with sustainability at its core – for our people, customers, investors, society, and planet.
   

  

**Digital Workplace Specialist**
 Are you ready to join a dynamic team at the forefront of the digital revolution? Do you thrive in a fast-paced, innovative environment where no two days are the same? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you!
   

  

 As a Digital Workplace Specialist, you will be at the heart of our digital transformation. Your responsibilities will include:
   

  

* Vendor Management: Develop and maintain strong relationships with our technology vendors to ensure we have the best tools and services available.
* Modern IT Support: Provide top-notch IT support, leveraging the latest technologies to keep our team productive and our systems running smoothly. We have an exciting "0 IT Support tickets goal" for EOY 2024. You'll play a key role in ensuring those tickets are first solved but then analyzed and planned for automation.
* Project Management: Lead and manage innovative projects that will shape the future of our digital workplace, from basic support tasks to implementing our next big thing.
* Tool Administration: Oversee the administration of our digital tools and platforms, ensuring they are optimized for efficiency and user satisfaction. This includes hands-on configuration and troubleshooting of a variety of third-party SaaS applications like Zoom, Slack, and Miro.
* New Work Creation: Be a pioneer in identifying and developing new processes and technologies that will enhance our digital workplace.


**What We're Looking For:**
* Proven experience in a digital workplace or IT support role.
* Strong project management skills with a knack for multitasking and prioritizing.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* A proactive, solution-oriented mindset with a passion for innovation.
* Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
* Familiarity with the latest digital tools and platforms.
* An understanding of IT fundamentals and a capability for finding systematic issues and repetitive tasks.
* A strong "can do" attitude and a love for helping people.
* Comfort with uncertainty and the ability to thrive in a less structured environment.
* A collaborative spirit and a preference for teamwork over working alone.


**Why Join Us?**
* Innovative Environment: Be part of a company that's leading the way in digital transformation and green steel production.
* Career Growth: Opportunities to grow and develop your skills in a supportive and forward-thinking environment.
* Fun Team: Join a team that values collaboration, creativity, and having fun at work.
* Flexible Working: Enjoy the flexibility of remote work options and a healthy work-life balance.
* Exciting Projects: Work on cutting-edge projects that will challenge and inspire you.
* Impactful Work: Make a positive impact on society and our planet by contributing to the decarbonization of the steel industry and beyond.
* Be the First of the New: At H2 Green Steel, we're not just looking for an employee; we're looking for a trailblazer. If you're ready to be the first of the new and help us build the digital workplace of tomorrow, we want to hear from you!


**What We Can Offer You**
 If you are passionate about making actual change and having a positive impact on society and our planet, H2 Green Steel offers a unique opportunity to be part of a fun and professional team with high ambitions.
   

  

 You will get the opportunity to shape your future career together with a company focusing on creating a culture where everyone can thrive and feel a sense of belonging. In the end, we know that H2 Green Steel’s growth and success is dependent on our people and we can’t wait to shape the future of steelmaking and other industries together as a team.

title: Lead Developer – Tech Lab
description:
At If, we believe that research, development, and experimentation are excellent ways to gain experience and learn firsthand how to utilize technology to create better services for our customers and explore new business opportunities. We also recognize that it is challenging for every team across our 1,100 people strong IT organization to dedicate their resources to exploring some of the more radical ideas.
 



  





**About Tech Lab** 




 Tech Lab is our internal research and development team. We are a small team of engineers with dedicated capacity to work with innovative ideas sourced from all areas of our organization. We research to find answers, create proof-of-concepts to explore viability, and join forces with other teams to build novel solutions for production use. More importantly, we work as a catalyst for innovation in the company through collaboration and knowledge sharing. Our team is passionate, diverse, and driven by curiosity. We believe that different perspectives boost innovation and strengthen our working culture.
 



  





**About The Role** 




 We are looking for a person with strong software development skills and ample experience combined with a true interest in sharing knowledge with others, a great cross-team collaboration facilitator with a pragmatic mindset – someone who is proactive and knows what it takes for a team to get things done and have fun along the way.
 



  





**Key responsibilities** 
**include:** 



* implementing ideas in code with your fellow teammates.
* designing solution architecture.
* facilitating ways of working within our own team and in new project constellations.
* collaborating with different stakeholders across the organization.



  





**Technology Stack** 




 The tech stack you would be working with is whatever the team finds best suited to solve the problem at hand. With that being said, some tech is more common than others at If, so proven experience in the following areas will be favorable:
 



  




* Azure Cloud and everything that comes with it, from Infrastructure-as-Code to optimization and monitoring.
* Azure DevOps and Git for CI/CD and Application Lifecycle Management.
* C# / .NET development.
* Web development with JS/TS and modern front-end frameworks.
* Python & Databricks.



  





 More importantly, you should be open to learning and adopting new technologies and probably consider yourself more of a generalist than a specialist.
 



  





**Who are you?** 




 To succeed in this role, we think you are curious with a solution-oriented mindset – not afraid to try and learn new things. We also love having discussions and figuring out things together; therefore, we value a collaborative team mentality with a willingness to share knowledge and be open to giving and receiving feedback on work. Lastly, you should feel comfortable working in different team setups since we collaborate with many different teams across If.
 



  





 This is a senior position, and you should have at least 5 years of professional software development experience and a bachelor’s degree (or higher) in a relevant field of study. Equivalent experience can substitute for the lack of an academic degree. If is a Nordic and Baltic company, thus the working language is English. Additionally, proficiency in a Nordic language is favorable.
 



  





**Hybrid work** 




 We apply a hybrid work approach. You are welcome in the office anytime, of course, but at a minimum, you should be prepared to come in a couple of days per week when a collaborative setting is more beneficial (like whiteboard sessions, pair programming, etc.). We adapt to the current initiative we are working on; some projects do require more physical presence than others.
 



  





**Additional Facts** 




**Application deadline:** 
 31th of July, due to summer vacation we will not be able to handle your application before the deadline of the application. Candidate selection and interviews will be done continuously until the position is filled.
 



**To apply for this position:** 
 Please attach your CV and answer the questions in the following steps in the recruiting system
 



**Work location:** 
 Bergshamra/Stockholm
 



**Start:** 
 As soon as possible/by agreement.
 



  





 For more information, please contact Elin Hellenius, Talent Acquisition Partner, elin.hellenius@if.se
 



  





 Final candidates will undergo a background check before a job offer can be presented. In addition to references, candidates can also be checked via the internet and social media.
 







**About Us** 








***We are If. Our purpose is to give people confidence today to shape their tomorrow.***




*To make this possible, trust is our backbone. We stay ahead and challenge ourselves to grow. And we always put our hearts into it – because it takes more than bright minds to make brilliant things happen.* 




*We are the leading insurance company in the Nordics/Baltics and a stable employer with 7,900 dedicated professionals. But most importantly, we are protectors of people, enablers of companies and encouragers of dreams. With our joint force of expertise and engagement we always stand by our customers’ side. Giving them the security and the confidence to be curious, explore new worlds, start new businesses and live their lives.* 




*We are an equal opportunity employer, convinced that a diverse and inclusive work culture boosts innovation and the growth of intellectual capital in many ways. It doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from, or what you look like. It is the different perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences each of us have and share, that will make a difference.* 




*Come and join us!*

title: Digital Client Manager
description:
*Publicis Groupe is one of the largest communications groups in the world. We are building the agency model of the future and take a holistic approach to our clients’ challenges. By fusing together our media, creative, data and technology expertise, we are able to provide clients with integrated solutions, transformative ideas and compelling consumer experiences. We call it the Power of One.* 




*We are proud winner of many awards and nominations, both in Sweden and internationally. But nothing makes us prouder than to work with clients and brands such as Disney, Elgiganten, Mondelez, Essity, Volvo, VISA, Lantmännen, Nomad Foods, Lactalis, Midsona, Renault and many more.* 




  





*At Publicis, we put our people first. We are proud to be certified by Great Place to Work (2022, 2023, 2024), and have been recognized with a Magnet Award for our engaging culture (2023). Our goal is to become the leading workplace in our industry. We are based in a fantastic office in Odenplan, but also offer a flexible work policy.* 




  





**Job Description** 




  





 As a Digital Client Service Manager, you love working with clients and deliver the best possible communication campaigns for them. You enjoy leading and motivating a team of channel specialists cross all online and offline channels and together you create the finest solutions for your clients.
 



  





 Your primary focus will be to lead and drive all campaign-related duties, from recommendations and planning to executing and evaluating the campaign. As Digital Client Manager you are also responsible for implementing and managing digital activations from start to finish. Including planning and buying, develop data-driven recommendations for media buying cross all channels full funnel and continuously analyze and evaluate campaign results and support your clients with actionable recommendations.
 



  





 At Publicis Media we put the client in focus and are both reliableand daring when approaching our commitments. We build on best practices while continuously challenging ourselves and others both internally and towards our clients. This role puts high demands towards you being solution oriented while instilling trust in your relationships.
 



  





**Qualifications** 




  




* 5+ years work experience from media and communications industry.
* You have good knowledge of digital marketing, measurement and measurement frameworks.
* Experience in social media and/or programmatic buying is meritorious.
* Academic or relevant post-secondary education
* We place high value on your ability to work in a structured manner with an optimistic, solution-oriented, and upbeat attitude.



  





**In addition to this, we are looking for someone who...** 




  




* Communicates clearly and inspire others in Swedish as well as in English.
* Is a skilled self-leaderand hasthe ability tosuccessfully leadothers.
* Is supportive, daring, engaged and responsible. Values collaboration and hasa collective mindset.
* Presents a great sense of business as well as a deep understanding of the media industry.
* Is great at building relationships and enjoys meeting new people.
* Is able to identify possibilities and solutions, adapting easily to change with an open mindset and sustainable approach.
* Hasa genuine understanding of project management, including how to lead a team and how to lead clients.
* Likes to work both strategically and operatively in a fast-paced environment.
* Is curious and meticulous with high ambition and analytical ability.
* Has a strong interest in technology, digital platforms and commerce.



  





**Additional Information** 




  





 In addition to a welcoming culture and inclusive environment with passionate colleagues we offer you:
 



  




* **Career Opportunities**



 Local and Global opportunities through the Power Of One.
 


* **Personal and Professional Learning**



 Global AI learning platform where you can participate in +30 000 classes and connect with colleagues from all over the world.
 


* **Flexible Ways of Working**



 We want to be an employer where work life balance is cherished. We love to spend time with our colleagues at the office but also believe in the output of your work not where the work is being done.
 


* **Work Your World**



 For six weeks a year, the world is yours. Every employee can work anywhere on the planet where there's a Publicis office. A new city, a favorite locale, or even a different country - Go. Grow. Explore.
 


* **Mental Health**



 The happiness and health of our people is paramount to us. We work continuously on maintaining a healthy and safe working environment through initiatives that facilitate the well-being of our employees.
 


* **Benefits**



 Generous benefit package.

title: Lärare i spanska 50% till Råsunda centralskola 7-9, Solna stad
description:
Om oss
   

  

 Råsunda centralskola är en 7-9 skola med lokaler på Parkvägen. Visionen för skolan är att varje person på Råsunda centralskola ska komma till sin rätt. I vår gemensamma värdegrund kring eleverna tänker vi att eleven vill om hen kan, att lika inte alltid är rättvist men framförallt att varje elev är rätt elev. Skolan har ett väl utvecklat elevhälsoarbete och en välfungerande och prioriterad organisation för särskilt stöd. Vi gör oss måna om att se varje elev som en individ.
   

  

**Om tjänsten**
 Vi söker nu en lärare i spanska på 50% på högstadiet. I vår skolutveckling fokuserar vi på differentiering och ett formativt förhållningssätt i vår undervisning och vi tror att samarbete är nyckeln både till ett kollegialt lärare och en förbättrad arbetssituation får våra pedagoger. Skolan har även ett pågående utvecklingsarbete, IBIS, tillsammans med Uppsala universitet.
   

  

**Vem söker vi?**
* Du är behörig lärare med lärarexamen och lärarlegitimation samt har erfarenhet av pedagogiskt arbete.
* Behörighet att undervisa i Sp för åk. 7-9.
* Din undervisning utgår från vetenskap och beprövad erfarenhet som gör att du lyckas skapa goda lärmiljöer (didaktisk, emotionell och fysisk).
* Du har ett positivt förhållningssätt till IT som ett självklart verktyg i såväl pedagogik som dokumentation.
* Du är väl förtrogen med LGR 22 och har kunskap om språkutvecklande arbetsmetoder.


 Som person är du lyhörd för elevernas behov, tydlig, respektfull och har stor förmåga till samverkan med såväl våra elever som föräldrar och kollegor. Du samverkar gärna med dina kollegor, både inom ditt ämne och över ämnesgränserna. Din arbetsinsats grundas utifrån ett stort engagemang där du är initiativrik och vill vara med och utveckla vår skola. Du planerar, organiserar och prioriterar på ett effektivt sätt och säkerställer att alla processer fullföljs med god kvalitet.
   

  

 Du är en trygg och tydlig ledare där ditt ledarskap bottnar sig i tron om att alla elever kan och vill utvecklas. Vi söker dig som kan skapa situationer där elever lyckas.
   

  

 Mer information om ansökan
   

  

 Tjänsten är en tillsvidaretjänst på 50% med tillträde 12 augusti. Om du har några frågor är du välkommen att höra av dig till biträdande rektor Hanna Adolfi på: hanna.adolfi@solna.se
   

  

 Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan med CV och personligt brev senast den
 **12 juli.** 
 Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via vårt rekryteringssystem. Intervjuer kan komma att ske fortlöpande.
   

  

**OBS!** 
 Om du inte har ett aktuellt utdrag ur belastningsregistret rekommenderar vi att du beställer ett sådant så snart som möjligt då vi behöver se detta innan du kan börja din anställning inom skolan.
   

  

 I Solna arbetar engagerade medarbetare med uppdraget att utveckla staden och välfärden med solnaborna i fokus. Detta gör oss till en spännande och utvecklande organisation att arbeta inom.
   

  

 Barn- och utbildningsförvaltningen svarar för omsorg och utbildning av barn och ungdomar. I verksamheten ingår förskola och öppna förskolan, fritidshem, grundskola, gymnasium, anpassad skola och anpassad gymnasieskola.
   

  

 Solna är en framtidsstad i tillväxt, unikt belägen mellan kungliga nationalstadsparkens lugn och storstadens puls. Vår vision är att Solna ska vara en levande och trygg stad, som förenar hållbar utveckling med en god ekonomisk hushållning för att trygga framtidens välfärd. Här finns attraktiva bostäder, framgångsrika företag, utmärkta kommunikationer, förstklassig samhällsservice och ett rikt kultur- och idrottsutbud. Solna stad är nu inne i en spännande utvecklingsfas, befolkningen växer och många företag söker sig hit.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: deltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 50% | Ort: Solna | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/220 | Kontakt: Hanna Adolfi, bitr. rektor 08-7461707, Åsa Eriksson, TF rektor 08-7463068, | Facklig företrädare: Kristina Karhunen, Sveriges Lärare 076-0410784, Zaradacht Yousef, Sveriges Lärare 070-2825980, | Publicerat: 2024-06-20 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-07-12

title: Technical World Designer
description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced Technical World Designer to join one of the game teams here at Embark, a team that is currently numbering around ~100 developers.
   

  

 As a World Designer at Embark, with your strong technical skills you will be responsible for spearheading designs and implementations for interactive gameplay components and activities in the game world, as well as systems and features for game modes. You will also take part in designing and implementing parts of our game world, creating spaces that are excellent for immersing players in our game world, and providing great spaces for gameplay. You will do so as part of a cross disciplinary team of other designers, coders and artists, collaborating in delivering amazing player experiences in a PvPvE game.
   

  

 As a senior member of the team you will collaborate closely with the directors and leads of the project, in refining concepts and ideas into tangible designs, prototypes and features, as well as Production leadership helping in articulating and establishing estimates, project scope and timelines.
   

  

**Examples of Responsibilities:**
* Design & implementation of or iteration on world-related gameplay systems
* Collaboration with other areas of design to facilitate or help implementation features that are represented in the world/levels.
* Help to identify areas in which workflows or tools can be improved, as well as assisting in the implementation/updating of tools.
* Assist with level design in collaboration with other level designers as well as environment artists where needed.
* Contribute to and own player experiences related to World Design, and systems.
* Fully or partially own the experience design of world gameplay features.


**It would be awesome if you have some of these:**
* 6+ years of experience designing and making games and a proven track record with multiple shipped titles.
* A high degree of proficiency with the Unreal Engine and experience with Blueprint and scripting.
* A good grasp of AAA PvP gameplay and game and systems design, including player psychology and gameplay mechanics and dynamics.
* A creative and curious mind.
* A good knowledge and familiarity with the various game maker disciplines, especially Coding but also Animation, Game Physics, 3D Art, UI/UX etc.
* A great team player that gets enjoyment out of creative collaboration in cross disciplinary groups.
* Professional English communication skills.


 At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.
   

  

 We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.
   

  

 Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.
   

  

 Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!
   

  

*If this role doesn't quite match what you're looking for, feel free to apply to us via our "* 
*Open Application.* 
*"*

title: Backend Engineer (Go) - Shared
description:
As a Backend Engineer at Embark you will be an integral part of a highly creative game team focused on building powerful and reusable infrastructure and backend components for our teams.
   

  

 Here you will have the opportunity to take initiative and drive finding solutions to exciting challenges, building the services that power our games, making sure they scale and continuously improve on them.
   

  

 As our game is distributed between game client, game server and the cloud, you’ll work together with your team to figure out which parts of the problem to solve in which location. At Embark we believe in creating smaller teams of well-aligned experts that can be trusted to create games and keep them running.
   

  

 Some examples of things we’re working on are matchmaking, authentication, gameserver infrastructure, etc. Some of the technologies we use to make all of those are Go, C++, Rust, GCP, AWS, Bazel, Terraform, Kubernetes, Google Spanner.
   

  

 You do not need to have any experience from games or games studios to apply.
   

  

**Example Of Responsibilities**
* Collaborate and work closely with fellow software engineers and technical directors
* Build and improve services, features and tools for game development
* Continuously improve our engineering practices
* Make sure your code adds a great amount of value to your colleagues


**We would love if you have some of these**
* A creative and curious mind
* A passion for interactive experiences, games and new technologies
* A solid understanding about distributed systems and experience building them
* A solid understanding about Site Reliability Engineering practices and what it takes to keep services running smoothly around the clock
* The ability to be a great team player with good communication skills
* A good grasp of performance, optimization and observability
* Experience with some of the technologies we use (all is absolutely not required)
* Interest in taking initiatives and driving finding solutions to exciting challenges
* Professional English communication skills


 At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.
   

  

 We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.
   

  

 Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.
   

  

 Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!
   

  

*If this role doesn't quite match what you're looking for, feel free to apply to us via our "* 
*Open Application.* 
*"*

title: Enterprise Sales Account Manager
description:
**Our Company**
 Changing the world through digital experiences is what Adobe’s all about. We give everyone—from emerging artists to global brands—everything they need to design and deliver exceptional digital experiences! We’re passionate about empowering people to create beautiful and powerful images, videos, and apps, and transform how companies interact with customers across every screen.
   

  

 We’re on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional employee experiences where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours!
   

  

 The opportunity:
   

  

 From the moment you wake up in the morning until you go to bed at night consider the media you consume, the adverts you see, the apps you use, the websites you browse and almost all of the shopping you do online throughout the day. Chances are that every single one of those interactions, every single one of those experiences, was touched by an Adobe product.
   

  

 We have a phenomenal opportunity for an Account Executive in our Digital Experience team based in Stockholm, Sweden and Copenhagen, Denmark!
   

  

 What you'll Do:
   

  

* Account Management – Lead the customer relationship across all solution segments
* Account Strategy – Responsible for developing over account strategy, partnering internally and externally to define technical vision and roadmap
* Business – Develops business case to deliver One Adobe story, focusing on business vision that supports a customer’s long-term strategy & use cases
* Upsell & Renewal – Responsible for the overall account health, ensuring that renewal risks are identified and addressed as well as expansion opportunities are identified
* Cross-Sell – Partner with Marketing to find opportunities to expand and sell new solutions and overseeing full sales opportunity lifecycle


 What you need to succeed:
   

  

* Strong communication and relationship building skills to become trusted client advisor
* Ability to position and communicate the value of Adobe products across solution segments
* Find opportunities for expansion or implementation of broader Adobe solution portfolio
* Strong project management skills to coordinate dedicated, pooled and solution specific resources
* Use client health data to identify adoption issues and proactively make recommendations
* Fluency in both Swedish and English is a must


 As our many awards will tell you, at Adobe you’ll be immersed in an exceptional work environment that is recognized around the world. You’ll be surrounded by colleagues who are committed to helping each other grow through our outstanding Check-In approach where ongoing feedback flows freely. If you’re looking to make an impact, Adobe's the place for you.
   

  

 Discover what our employees are saying about their career experiences on the Adobe Life blog, https://blog.adobe.com/en/topics/adobe-life and explore the fantastic benefits we offer at Rewards.adobe.com.
   

  

 Adobe is an equal opportunity employer. We hire talented individuals, regardless of gender, race or colour, ethnicity or national origin, age, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or veteran status. We know that when our employees feel appreciated and included, they can be more creative, innovative and successful. This is what it means to be Adobe For All.
   

  

 We’re on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional employee experiences where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours!
   

  

 Adobe is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and affirmative action employer. We do not discriminate based on gender, race or color, ethnicity or national origin, age, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law. Learn more.
   

  

 Adobe aims to make Adobe.com accessible to any and all users. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation to navigate our website or complete the application process, email accommodations@adobe.com or call (408) 536-3015.
   

  

 Adobe values a free and open marketplace for all employees and has policies in place to ensure that we do not enter into illegal agreements with other companies to not recruit or hire each other’s employees.

title: Site Reliability Engineer - AWS
description:
*Tink was founded in 2012, and a decade later became part of Visa in 2022. Tink was created with the aim of changing the banking industry for the better. We have built Europe’s most robust open banking platform – with the broadest, deepest connectivity and powerful services that create value out of the financial data. We offer the tools that allow anyone – from big banks and fintechs to startups – to build the future of financial services across Europe.*
 Perhaps the most dramatic outcome of the digital revolution is the amount of data that is now collected and analyzed. Tink handles billions of events, and this number is increasing at an exponential rate. We are passionate about enabling data-driven decisions for our clients and internal stakeholders. Our goal is to ensure data is collected, transformed, and presented securely with accuracy and reliability. Building the infrastructure and services to support this is hence a key part of what Tink engineers are doing.
   

  

 At Tink, our Data and Analytics area is home to dedicated teams working to deliver a dynamic platform, infrastructure, and toolset that meet our organization's evolving needs. As we expand, we're on the hunt for skilled Site Reliability Engineers (SREs). If you're an expert in your field looking for an opportunity to elevate our offerings, we'd love to hear from you.
   

  

**What We Offer You**
 As a Site Reliability Engineer in one of Tink's data platform & infrastructure teams, encompassing a wide range of technologies across multiple cloud vendors. This means that you will be working in an international environment where your responsibilities will include:
   

  

* Ensuring the scalability, reliability and security of our most critical operational data stores and data pipelines.
* Developing automation and tooling to enable other engineering teams to focus on core business activities.
* Collaborating with stakeholders to ensure that the services and tools align with their evolving requirements and use cases.
* Being a best practice champion; influence and create new designs, architectures, standards and methods for large-scale systems


 We strongly believe in the power of collaboration, both within our team and in partnership with other teams and stakeholders. Working together is the cornerstone of building exceptional teams, delivering outstanding products, and fostering personal growth. It forms the very essence of our work culture and defines how we operate.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
 We are currently seeking talented individuals to join one of Tinks data platform & infrastructure teams, working from our office in central Stockholm.
   

  

 We would like you to have
   

  

* Several years of engineering experience.
* Experience in designing, building, and managing large-scale, cloud-based platforms or applications using AWS.
* Hands-on experience in an Infrastructure as Code (IaC) environment, specifically using tools like Terraform.
* Proficiency in one or more programming languages, such as Java, Go, or Python.
* Knowledge and experience with AWS managed databases such as RDS and DynamoDB.


 This is a hybrid position. Hybrid employees can alternate time between both remote and office. Employees in hybrid roles are expected to work from the office 2-3 days a week (determined by leadership/site), with a general guidepost of being in the office 50% or more of the time based on business needs.
   

  

*Who we are at Tink*
*We are a company of developers and engineers – it’s in our DNA to imagine, build and iterate. We were founded with a vision of transforming an industry that lacked competition and momentum. And we have built a company of passionate over-achievers who all believe there is always a better way of doing things.*
*People from all over Europe – and the world – have joined us on our mission to build the biggest and best open banking platform in Europe.*
*We're looking forward to your application!*
 Tink was founded in 2012, and a decade later became part of Visa in 2022. Tink was created with the aim of changing the banking industry for the better. We have built Europe’s most robust open banking platform – with the broadest, deepest connectivity and powerful services that create value out of the financial data. We offer the tools that allow anyone – from big banks and fintechs to startups – to build the future of financial services across Europe.
